title: Altamont and Robert Lazzarini Present: Distorted
description:
ALTAMONT x ROBERT LAZZARINI COLLAB: DISTORTED: 

ROBERT LAZZARINI IS AN ARTIST BEST KNOWN FOR HIS MATHEMATICAL DISTORTIONS OF OBJECTS AND SCULPTURES THAT DEFY OUR HABITUAL SENSE OF SPACE.

MOST RECENTLY, LAZZARINI’S BROUGHT HIS DISTORTEDLY UNIQUE WORLDVIEW TO ALTAMONT FOR A TEE COLLABORATION. HIS DESIGNS ARE A REINTERPRETATION OF THE OLD WEST.
